021import net.kyori.adventure.platform.bukkit.BukkitAudiences;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.menu.folia.FoliaPlayer;
024import net.tnemc.paper.PaperCore;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.Location;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
029import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
030import org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer;
031
032import java.util.List;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.UUID;
035
036/**
037 * FoliaPlayerProvider
038 *
039 * @author creatorfromhell
040 * @since 0.1.2.0
041 */
042public class FoliaPlayerProvider extends FoliaPlayer implements PlayerProvider {
043
044  private final OfflinePlayer player;
045
046  public FoliaPlayerProvider(final OfflinePlayer player) {
047
048    super(player, PaperCore.instance().getPlugin());
049    this.player = player;
050  }
051
052  /**
053   * Used to get the {@link UUID} of this player.
054   *
055   * @return The {@link UUID} of this player.
056   */
057  @Override
058  public UUID identifier() {
059
060    return player.getUniqueId();
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Used to get the name of this player.
065   *
066   * @return The name of this player.
067   */
068  @Override
069  public String getName() {
070
071    return player.getName();
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Used to get the location of this player.
076   *
077   * @return The location of this player.
078   */
079  @Override
080  public Optional<Location> getLocation() {
081
082    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
083      return Optional.empty();
084    }
085
086    final org.bukkit.Location locale = player.getPlayer().getLocation();
087
088    return Optional.of(new Location(locale.getWorld().getName(),
089                                    locale.getX(), locale.getY(),
090                                    locale.getZ()
091    ));
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * Used to get the name of the world this player is currently in.
096   *
097   * @return The name of the world.
098   */
099  @Override
100  public String world() {
101
102    String world = TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion();
103
104    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
105      world = player.getPlayer().getWorld().getName();
106    }
107    return world;
108  }
109
110  /**
111   * Used to get the name of the biome this player is currently in.
112   *
113   * @return The name of the biome.
114   */
115  @Override
116  public String biome() {
117
118    String biome = TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion();
119
120    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
121      biome = player.getPlayer().getLocation().getBlock().getBiome().getKey().getKey();
122    }
123    return biome;
124  }
125
126  /**
127   * Used to get the amount of experience this player has.
128   *
129   * @return The amount of levels this player has.
130   */
131  @Override
132  public int getExp() {
133
134    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
135      return 0;
136    }
137    return (int)player.getPlayer().getExp();
138  }
139
140  /**
141   * Used to set the amount of experience this player has.
142   *
143   * @param exp The amount of experience to set for this player.
144   */
145  @Override
146  public void setExp(final int exp) {
147
148    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
149      player.getPlayer().setTotalExperience(exp);
150    }
151  }
152
153  /**
154   * Used to get the amount of experience levels this player has.
155   *
156   * @return The amount of experience levels this player has.
157   */
158  @Override
159  public int getExpLevel() {
160
161    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
162      return 0;
163    }
164    return player.getPlayer().getLevel();
165  }
166
167  /**
168   * Used to set the amount of experience levels this player has.
169   *
170   * @param level The amount of experience levels to set for this player.
171   */
172  @Override
173  public void setExpLevel(final int level) {
174
175    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
176      player.getPlayer().setLevel(level);
177    }
178  }
179
180  @Override
181  public FoliaInventoryProvider inventory() {
182
183    return new FoliaInventoryProvider(identifier(), PaperCore.instance().getPlugin());
184  }
185
186  @Override
187  public List<String> getEffectivePermissions() {
188
189    return List.of();
190  }
191
192  /**
193   * Used to determine if this player has the specified permission node.
194   *
195   * @param permission The node to check for.
196   *
197   * @return True if the player has the permission, otherwise false.
198   */
199  @Override
200  public boolean hasPermission(final String permission) {
201
202    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
203      return false;
204    }
205    return player.getPlayer().hasPermission(permission);
206  }
207
208  @Override
209  public void message(final String message) {
210
211    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
212      message(new MessageData(message));
213    }
214  }
215
216  /**
217   * Used to send a message to this command source.
218   *
219   * @param messageData The message data to utilize for this translation.
220   */
221  @Override
222  public void message(final MessageData messageData) {
223
224    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
225      return;
226    }
227
228    try(final BukkitAudiences provider = BukkitAudiences.create(PaperCore.instance().getPlugin())) {
229      MessageHandler.translate(messageData, player.getUniqueId(), provider.sender(player.getPlayer()));
230    }
231  }
232
233  public OfflinePlayer getPlayer() {
234
235    return player;
236  }
237
238
239  public static FoliaPlayerProvider find(final String identifier) {
240
241    try {
242      return new FoliaPlayerProvider(Bukkit.getOfflinePlayer(UUID.fromString(identifier)));
243    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
244      return new FoliaPlayerProvider(Bukkit.getOfflinePlayer(identifier));
245    }
246  }
247}
